}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Name: [[Fn-Link]] 6222B-SRC :OEM: [[Askey]] 8822CS (FCC) *Chipset: [[Realtek]] RTL8822CS *Wi-Fi: 802.11ac 2T2R (2.4/5GHz) *Interface: SDIO (WLAN), UART/PCM (BT) *Bluetooth: BT 4.2+HS; Host Digital IF: :- HCI UART (up to 4Mbps) :- PCM for audio data
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== :;[[Fn-Link]] • [http://www.fn-link.com/product_list.html Models] *[[Fn-Link 6222B-PRB]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8222BE *[[Fn-Link 6222B-SRB]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8222BS *[[Fn-Link 6222B-SRC]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8822CS *[[Fn-Link 6222D-UUB]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8822BU
==See also== *[[Fn-Link 6221A-SRC]] • Wi-Fi 1x1 11ac BT 4.2 Module :[[Askey]] SDM8821 • [[Realtek]] RTL8821CS (SDIO/SD) :FCC ID: H8N-SDM8821 (03/14/2021) • ''Onn.'' stick :;[https://www.fn-link.com/Wi-Fi-6-Module-pl3170360.html Wi-Fi 6 Module] *[[Fn-Link N200A-SR]] • Wi-Fi 6 Module :[[AIC]] AIC8800M • 1T1R 802.11ax, BT 5.0 BLE, SDIO/USB :''AIC Semiconductor (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.'' (WFA113503) *[[Fn-Link 8291M-PR]] • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Module :[[QCA]] QCA6391 • 2T2R 802.11ax DBS, BT 5.1 BLE, PCIe/UART *[[Fn-Link 8291N-PR]] • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Module :[[QCA]] QCA6391 • 2T2R 802.11ax DBS, BT 5.1 BLE, PCIe/UART *[[Fn-Link 6252B-SR]] • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Module :[[Realtek]] RTL8852BS • 2T2R 802.11ax, BT 5.2 BLE, SDIO/UART <!-- :Qualcomm, Broadcom/Cypress, Microchip, Marvell, On, Realtek, MTK, Espressif :Huawei, ZTE, Quectel, Langli Semiconductor, Southern Silicon Valley, Aikewei *PCIe: RTL8852AE-VR-CG (UART BT), QCA6391, QCA206X *USB: RTL8852AU-CG, MT7921AUN, AIC8800D *SDIO: RTL8852BS, AIC8800M :M.2 2230 (22x30 PCIe) :22x20/LGA96 (SMD PCIe) :15x13/LGA50 (SMD PCIe/SDIO) :13x12/LGA14 (SMD USB) :27x18/LGA32 (SMD) -->
